TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IImplicitResourceProvider

summary.span: 定义方法，类可实现这些方法用作隐式资源提供程序。

span.span: Defines methods a class implements to act as an implicit resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可在页中显式或隐式声明资源。Resources can be declared explicitly or implicitly within a page. 隐式资源允许开发人员将资源值集合分配给一个语句中的控件, 而不是单独分配每个值。Implicit resources allow the developer to assign a collection of resource values to a control in one statement rather than assigning each value individually. 当页分析器遇到的隐式资源`meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`时, 它会将所有值`WelcomeLabel`与资源键前缀一起分配给控件中的相应值。When the page parser encounters an implicit resource in the form of `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`, it assigns all the values with the `WelcomeLabel` resource key prefix to the corresponding values in the control. 例如, 如果资源`WelcomeLabel.Text`文件定义了和`WelcomeLabel.ToolTip`的值, 则会将这些值分配`Label`给具有对`WelcomeLabel`的隐式引用的控件。For example, if a resource file defines values for `WelcomeLabel.Text` and `WelcomeLabel.ToolTip`, those values would be assigned to a `Label` control with an implicit reference to `WelcomeLabel`. 接口定义资源提供程序为访问隐式资源而实现的方法。The interface defines the methods a resource provider implements to access implicit resources. 您可以使用方法获取特定值。You can obtain a particular value using the method. 如果创建自定义资源提供程序, 则无需为隐式资源本地化提供自定义支持。If you create a custom resource provider, you do not need to provide customized support for implicit resource localization. 隐式本地化可与资源提供程序一起使用。Implicit localization will work with your resource provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetImplicitResourceKeys(string keyPrefix) cil managed
Public Function GetImplicitResourceKeys (keyPrefix As String) As ICollection

param.name: keyPrefix
param.span: 要收集的隐式资源键的前缀。

span.span: The prefix of the implicit resource keys to be collected.

summary.span: 获取前缀所指定的隐式资源键的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of implicit resource keys as specified by the prefix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现时, 方法返回特定前缀的隐式资源键的集合。When implemented, the method returns a collection of implicit resource keys for a particular prefix. 例如, `WelcomeLabel`在表达式`meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`中指定为前缀。For example, `WelcomeLabel` is specified as the prefix in the expression `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`. 应使用此方法返回本地资源文件`WelcomeLabel`中以前缀形式提供的任何属性。Any properties in a local resource file with `WelcomeLabel` as a prefix should be returned with this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetObject (System.Web.Compilation.ImplicitResourceKey key, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetObject(class System.Web.Compilation.ImplicitResourceKey key, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function GetObject (key As ImplicitResourceKey, culture As CultureInfo) As Object

param.name: key
param.span: 包含前缀、筛选器和属性的资源键。

span.span: The resource key containing the prefix, filter, and property.

param.name: culture
param.span: ，表示资源被本地化为的区域性。

span.span: The that represents the culture for which the resource is localized.

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象表示指定资源键的值。

span.span: Gets an object representing the value of the specified resource key.

returns.span: ，表示隐式资源键的本地化值。

span.span: An representing the localized value of an implicit resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现时, 方法将返回隐式资源键所表示的值的对象。When implemented, the method returns the object for the value represented by the implicit resource key.
